speaker: Doctor
text: Good morning, Mrs. Thompson. How have you been managing with your COPD medications lately?

speaker: Patient
text: Morning, Doctor. I've been using the albuterol more often, especially with the weather changes.

speaker: Doctor
text: I see. Are you using the tiotropium daily as prescribed?

speaker: Patient
text: Yes, I take it every morning, but sometimes I feel it's not enough when I'm short of breath.

speaker: Doctor
text: We might need to reassess your inhaler use. Have you noticed any side effects from the alendronate for your osteoporosis?

speaker: Patient
text: Not really, but I do worry about my bones since my mom had similar issues.
